text: The media lied about the Russia collusion hoax. They lied about the Mueller probe and Brett Kavanaugh and Mike Flynn. They lied about the impeachment farce. They lied about the coronavirus and the lockdowns. And now they’re lying about the riots. @FDRLST https://t.co/LgSvsAXDxq
